Entries.Daine.Dahlia.4H/SawEvent Daine.Dahlia.3H: continue/-500 -500/farmer 51 38 3 {{Dahlia}} 42 50 0/skippable/action AddMail Current Daine.SeenEvent.Dahlia received/positionOffset {{Dahlia}} 0 -12/advancedMove farmer false -9 0 3 100/globalFadeToClear/viewport 41 40/speed {{Dahlia}} 4/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 0 -10 4 100/jump {{Dahlia}} 5/pause 100/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "Hey!"/waitforAllStationary/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 8/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 3/pause 200/jump {{Dahlia}} 5/pause 250/emote farmer 28/speak {{Dahlia}} "I've been looking all over for you! What gives?$16"/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 12/question null " #Wait, you have?#Are you feeling better then?"/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 4/speak {{Dahlia}} "Is that really important? I need to show you something right away!$17"/pause 250/advancedmove {{Dahlia}} false 0 -1 -1 0 0 -1 1 100/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "March! This way, please!"/pause 250/emote farmer 28/speed {{Dahlia}} 3/advancedMove farmer false 4 0 1 100/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 4 0 3 100/fade/viewport -100 -100/pause 250/waitforAllStationary/changeLocation EastScarp_Orchard/playMusic winter1/beginSimultaneousCommand/warp farmer 24 16 true/warp {{Dahlia}} 29 15 true/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 3/endSimultaneousCommand/positionOffset {{Dahlia}} 0 -12/globalFadeToClear/viewport 30 17/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 3/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 4/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Have you seen this house before, farmer? It's really, really out of the way.$15"/speed farmer -1/advancedMove farmer false 3 0 1 100/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 0/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Almost no-one ever comes here. I think most of the townies must have forgotten it exists.$18#$b#Because of that, it looks like it's become a breeding ground for all sorts of monsters, just like in those mountain caves.$17"/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 12/jump {{Dahlia}} 4/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 0 1 -1 0 3 100/pause 100/speak {{Dahlia}} "Wouldn't it be much better if everything in there was gone?$7#$b#Then there would be no rock crabs or bats or slimes troubling the Scarp.$6"/pause 250/emote farmer 28/speak {{Dahlia}} "YOU'RE a hero, @ - everyone in town says so. And you've been in those old caves!$1"/pause 250/stopMusic/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 37 37 37/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 288/speak {{Dahlia}} "Here! I got you a blade, so you could go and slay everything while it's too young to cause trouble, and then no one will have to worry anymore.$6"/emote farmer 16/pause 250/quickQuestion 'Go on! Take it!'#Wh-?? I - I guess I could, but...#I'm not a hero, Dahlia!#There's a difference between heroism and aggression, Dahlia!(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.4H.A(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.4H.B(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.4H.C

Entries.Daine.Dahlia.4H.A: pause 250/playmusic sad_kid/emote {{Dahlia}} 8/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 12/addItem (W)48/pause 250/emote farmer 28/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Why do you sound so unsure? Isn't this what's best for everybody? They're just monsters.$22"/pause 250/emote farmer 40/pause 250/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 3 0 4 100/pause 150/emote {{Dahlia}} 28/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "This isn't right at all, aren't you supposed to charge in and look after everyone? Isn't that what heroes do?$20"/pause 250/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "I don't understand."/pause 250/emote farmer 28/question null "#Even if they're annoying, crabs and bats are an important part of nature.#It just feels wrong to hurt something that hasn't done anything."/pause 250/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 33 33 33/speak {{Dahlia}} "Is it malice, then? Is that what makes a monster? The ability to choose? I don't...$15#$b#... I don't understand what I'm getting wrong. I'm sorry, farmer, I guess this is still beyond me.$21"/pause 250/emote farmer 28/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 35 35 35/speak {{Dahlia}} "You head back without me. I'll be fine making my way home. And stay safe, okay?$15#$b#I want to sit with this a little longer. I want to understand.$2"/pause 250/emote farmer 40/advancedMove farmer false -10 0 3 100/pause 150/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end
Entries.Daine.Dahlia.4H.B: pause 250/playmusic Overcast/jump {{Dahlia}} 4/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 12/action AddMail Current Dahlia.Nohero received/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "What do you mean you're not a hero?! Of course you're a hero!$13#$b#Everyone talks about how you saved the town! How you're fixing everyone's problems! This is just one more problem to fix!$5"/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 12/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 3 0 4 100/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "If you're not a hero, then what chance do I have at figuring this out?$18#$b#It, you - you! And this...$17"/pause 250/question null "#....Are you okay?#Do you need a minute?"/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 33 33 33/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "...I don't know. I thought I'd finally figured something out.$20"/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 36 36 36/emote farmer 28/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "You should... head back to whatever you were doing before. I'm sorry, I... I'll be fine getting back. I want to think a little longer.$2"/pause 250/emote farmer 40/speak {{Dahlia}} "I will be all right. I just don't understand why I'm still getting this wrong.$21#$b#Take care, okay? Don't get hurt.$15"/pause 250/advancedMove farmer false -10 0 3 100/pause 150/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end
Entries.Daine.Dahlia.4H.C: pause 250/playmusic fall3/emote {{Dahlia}} 40/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 12/speak {{Dahlia}} "...What do you mean? Aren't monsters a hero's responsibility? Did I get that wrong?$15"/pause 250/emote farmer 28/pause 250/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false 2 0 1 100/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 29 29 29/question null "#Even if that's the case, slaying a baby animal isn't the same as....#Bats and crabs aren't the same things as monsters, they're just wild animals."/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "But they'll grow up to be a menace. They scramble all over, and bother people, and...$2#$b#...Did I get it wrong? Is that not enough?$20"/pause 250/emote farmer 40/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 29 29 29 29 29 29 29 29 30 30 29 29 29 29 29 29 29/speak {{Dahlia}} "I think I almost made a terrible mistake. I - I'm sorry, farmer. I feel like I've caused you a mess of trouble.$21#$b#You can head back without me, I'll be all right. I want to think about this some more.$18"/pause 250/advancedMove farmer false 1 0 1 100/emote farmer 40/pause 250/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "I'll be okay."/pause 1000/advancedMove farmer false -10 0 3 100/friendship {{Dahlia}} 25/pause 150/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end

Entries.Daine.Dahlia.5H/SawEvent Daine.Dahlia.4H: none/-100 -100/farmer 18 11 0 {{Dahlia}} -500 -500 1/action AddMail Current Daine.SeenEvent.Dahlia received/skippable/pause 100/globalFadeToClear/viewport 18 8//pause 250/emote farmer 28/advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 4 0 1 100/waitForAllStationary/playSound stairsdown/fade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation {{Dahlia}}_Mine/viewport -100 -100/beginSimultaneousCommand/warp farmer 6 10 true/warp {{Dahlia}} 26 13 true/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 1/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 38 38 38/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 50/globalFadeToClear/viewport 21 14/speed farmer 3/advancedMove farmer false 0 4 18 0 1 100/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 38/animate {{Dahlia}} false false 250 38 39 40 39 38 38 38 38 39 40 45 42/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 42 45 42 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 41 42 45 42 41 41 41 41 41/pause 350/speak {{Dahlia}} "Oh! You made it.$3"/pause 250/playMusic Icicles/textAboveHead {{Dahlia}} "That was actually faster than I expected."/waitForAllStationary/emote farmer 12/jump farmer 3/pause 250/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 38/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 39 40 39 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 39 40 39/speak {{Dahlia}} "Hm? Oh, right, the letter. I figured phrasing it that way would make you worry, so...$9#$b#It takes a lot to get down this far, doesn't it?$10"/jump farmer 5/emote farmer 16/question null " #I was genuinely worried about you!#How did you even make it this far down unarmed?"/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "....Oh. Um. well, I'm pretty okay at looking after myself, so...$18#$b#...Sorry, I just wanted a quiet place to talk.$11"/pause 250/emote {{Dahlia}} 28/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "But um, hey - since you're down here anyway, do you think we could sit, and have a conversation...?$15"/pause 250/advancedMove farmer false 2 0 1 100/waitForAllStationary/animate farmer false true 117 117 117/positionOffset farmer 60 62/emote {{Dahlia}} 40/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "It's actually kind of hard to figure out where to start. So you know I'm trying to learn how heroes think, for my next role.$20"/pause 250/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 42 41 42 42 42 42 42 42 45 42 42 42 42 42 42/speak {{Dahlia}} "That's been a lot harder than I thought it was going to be. Books and movies - they don't really get into the day to day, just the grand gestures.$15"/pause 250/playSound shadowpeep/emote {{Dahlia}} 28/animate {{Dahlia}} false true 250 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 39 40 39 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 38 39 40 39/addTemporaryActor {{Ghost}} 16 24 6 10 1 true/speed {{Ghost}} 2/advancedMove {{Ghost}} false 0 3 2 1000 5 0 1 1500 12 0 1 100/speak {{Dahlia}} "It's why I talked to you! I told you about this already. But getting to know you, talking to you, a lot of what you do and say is different from...$19#$b# -- And again, different isn't BAD, I just feel... lost.$11"/pause 250/playSound ghost/speak {{Dahlia}} "And I really don't know how to deal with the lost. And I feel terrible! You've been so patient, and...$15"/playsound shadowpeep/emote farmer 16/positionOffset farmer -60 -62/stopAnimation farmer 0/faceDirection farmer 3/jump farmer 3/advancedMove farmer false -1 0 0 -1 3 100/waitForAllStationary/jump farmer 5/advancedMove farmer false -2 0 3 100/playsound swordswipe/animate farmer true false 55 30 31 32 33 34 35/pause 250/animate {{Ghost}} false false 250 0 16 17 18 19/playSound ghost/pause 1250/warp {{Ghost}} 100 100/pause 150/stopAnimation {{Dahlia}} 12/faceDirection {{Dahlia}} 3/jump {{Dahlia}} 6/emote {{Dahlia}} 16/shake {{Dahlia}} 1000/speak {{Dahlia}} "You killed it! Why did you do that?$13"/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/quickQuestion #You would've gotten hurt!#Heroes try to help people, Dahl.(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.5H.A(break)switchEvent Daine.Dahlia.5H.B

Entries.Daine.Dahlia.5H.A: pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "You could've gotten hurt instead! I'm a lot more durable than -$16"/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "Oh. Oh, I get it. I think something just... clicked.$3"/pause 250/advancedMove {{Dahlia}} false -1 0 3 100/waitForAllStationary/animate {{Dahlia}} false false 250 12 21 22 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 24 23 22 21 12/emote farmer 28/speak {{Dahlia}} "This is actually a terrible place to talk, isn't it? I think... there's probably better options.$10#$b#I've really been putting it off, but it might be best if you come see me at home next time. Not today, just... soon.$14"/pause 250/jump {{Dahlia}} 3/speak {{Dahlia}} "Come see me in Lore's Cove again next time. Okay? I owe you so many explanations.$7#$b#And um. Thanks.$14"/pause 250/fade/viewport -500 -500/pause 250/end
Entries.Daine.Dahlia.5H.B: pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "A Hero?$19"/pause 250/emote farmer 60/pause 250/speak {{Dahlia}} "...A hero. Huh.
